definition: sports lottery (sports betting run by a government agency, China Sports Lottery) (abbr. for 體育彩票|体育彩票[ti3 yu4 cai3 piao4])

sentences.english: Where is the address of center of shenzhen body colour excuse me specific address?
sentences.chinese: 請問深圳體彩中心的地址在什麼地方，具體地址？

sentences.english: Security guards also restricted access to the lottery center, the Chongqing Evening News reports.
sentences.chinese: 體彩中心的入口也進行了嚴格的安全保護。

sentences.english: When Italian artist Guido Daniele was hired by an advertising agency to create body painting of animals, he loved the idea.
sentences.chinese: 創作動物圖案的人體彩繪時，他非常喜歡這個創意。
